title: 健康中心已於9/2搬遷至學生活動中心C103(Health Center Relocated to Student Activity Center C103 as of September 2)
content:
分類： 行政公告
來源： 學務處衛生保健組 - 吳星穎 - carmier@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話8906252
對象： 全校學生_大一_大二_大三_大四以上_碩士生_博士生
標題： 健康中心已於9/2搬遷至學生活動中心C103(Health Center Relocated to Student Activity Center C103 as of September 2)
日期： Fri, 6 Sep 2024 13:32:11 +0800

各位同學大家好，
   健康中心已於9月2日搬遷至學生活動中心C103樓。新址提供以下服務：
健康自我管理（包括量血壓、量身高體重、量體脂等）、傷病照護、醫療器材借用（包括拐杖、輪椅、醫藥箱、冰熱敷袋等），如有需要，歡迎前往新址使用相關服務。我們期待在新環境中繼續為大家提供支持與幫助。

祝健康愉快！
                                                                                                                                           健康中心
Dear Students,
  We are pleased to inform you that the Health Center has relocated to Student Activity Center C103 as of September 2. The new location offers the following services:
Health self-management (including blood pressure measurement, height and weight measurement, body fat measurement, etc.)、Injury and illness care、Medical equipment loan (including crutches, wheelchairs, first aid kits, ice/heat packs, etc.)
If you need any of these services, please visit us at the new location. We look forward to continuing to support and assist you in our new environment.

Wishing you good health!

Health Center
